meanings.definition: An enzyme that catalyzes the oxidation of a substrate by hydrogen peroxide.
meanings.sent1: The peroxidase in the plant helps break down harmful substances.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study peroxidase to understand how it affects chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The peroxidase at the party was the one making all the drinks fizz!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a peroxidase, speeding up the process of achieving her goals.
meanings.sent5: The peroxidase acted like a superhero, fighting off the dangerous hydrogen peroxide.
